Ã‚Â Ã‚Â Ã‚Â Flute solo: Wu Guozhong

Wu Guozhong, China famous blowpipe music player, native of Beijing, was born in 1957 in Guangzhou, two national performer, won the second session of the Guangzhou Fair flute music game show prize, third Rams Music Fair and the National Guangdong Music Competition first prize, Guangdong Province, Hong Kong music elite competition Excellence Award. Macau invited organizations with the art of music performances and awards celebration to Portugal, Mr. Wu Guozhong had long cooperation with overseas countries music record companies, recording a lot of music products and Guangdong music album.
Flute solo "Swagger Cui Ma and transportation busy," the Ã©Â­ï¿½Ã¦ËœÂ¾Ã¥Â¿Â  creation in the early seventies. It is a vivid and simple musical language, describing the farmers after the harvest drove carts full of food, beaming to the state sell grain tax scenarios. Structure with introduction of ABA ternary form. Prelude music image is very clear, fast and strong backing band play the Mercedes-Benz Silent, with vibrato play the flute is a long tone, followed by another the next calendar using the unique combination of voice and staccato play the figure, and it would The food convoys scurry, farmer yelling fire scene lively horses show in front of an audience. The first was a joy Allegretto, song tune four sentences body warm and cheerful, fun and lively repartee echoing phrase. After the sudden slow into the middle of contrasting. Middle stretch and full of singing the theme tune filled with joy emotions, to express joy folks pride. When repeated this theme flower clusters rhythm, so that the music adds an optimistic, witty color. Reproducing music piece more emotionally warm and lively. Finally, cries of joy in imitating the horse after the flute to play the high-pitched tone of the song ends the whole song.
